bullish.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He’s very bullish about the company’s prospects.
bullish.translation[0].definitions[1].de: in a business market that is bullish, the prices of shares are rising or seem likely to rise
bullish.translation[1].definitions[0].de: expecting prices on a financial market to rise or economic activity to increase
bullish.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: We’re not bullish in terms of an art market recovery this year.
Good results from Schering encouraged a bullish mood in pharmaceuticals.
It’s hard to find analysts who aren’t bullish on banks.
